name: .ARTPAGE
summary: Learn about .ARTPAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open ARTPAGE files with FOREVER Artisan (Windows). For example, you can open an ARTPAGE file with version 5 and 6 of Artisan by selecting File â†’ Open. However, version 6 of Artisan may not display the pages correctly.

Since ARTPAGE files are Zip archives, you can rename the .artpage file extension as .zip, then extract its contents with a Zip-compression utility. For example, Microsoft File Explorer in Windows and Apple Archive Utility in macOS can extract files from the renamed ARTPAGE file.
FOREVER Artisan can convert ARTPAGE files to various file types, including the following formats:
